snippet: The California Public Employees' Retirement System (Calpers), America's largest public pension fund, is expected to approve nearly 100 types of extra pay on Wednesday that will count toward how pensions are calculated for newly hired workers....

headline.print_headline: Calpers Set to Allow 100 Extra Pay Types Count Toward Pensions
headline.main: Calpers Set to Allow 100 Extra Pay Types Count Toward Pensions

lead_paragraph: The California Public Employees' Retirement System (Calpers), America's largest public pension fund, is expected to approve nearly 100 types of extra pay on Wednesday that will count toward how pensions are calculated for newly hired workers.
